meanings.definition: The round of a competition or tournament that precedes the semifinals and follows the preliminary rounds.
meanings.sent1: In the quarterfinals, the teams compete to reach the next stage of the tournament.
meanings.sent2: The quarterfinals of the soccer championship are always intense.
meanings.sent3: During the quarterfinals, the underdog team surprised everyone with their unexpected win.
meanings.sent4: The quarterfinals are like a battlefield where only the strongest teams survive.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the air during the quarterfinals is palpable.

meanings.definition: The four matches or teams that make up this round.
meanings.sent1: The quarterfinals will determine which teams advance to the next level.
meanings.sent2: Each of the quarterfinals will be played in a different stadium.
meanings.sent3: The quarterfinals lineup includes some of the top teams in the league.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the stadium during the quarterfinals is electrifying.
meanings.sent5: The quarterfinals bring out the best in every team.
